alert.note: Alert for Forest; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Forest and southeastern Vilas Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kentuck Lake Campground, or 11 miles east of Eagle River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kentuck Lake Campground around 435 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Wisconsin.
